key.name: model
key.description: Model name passed to the Anthropic API when generating filename suggestions (e.g. "claude-haiku-4-5-20251001", "claude-sonnet-4-5-20250929"). The model must be available under your API key.

key.name: api-key
key.description: Your Anthropic API key from console.anthropic.com. Set with: dconf write /com/github/ai-rename/api-key "'your-key-here'"

key.name: max-filename-length
key.description: Maximum number of characters allowed in the generated filename stem (the extension is appended separately and is not counted).
